name: EgyBest_Dark Mode (Night Mode)
description:
Are your eyes tired of the bright color on Egybest? if so, this theme is for you, it will make your eyes feel better and relieved while enjoying your best movies on Egybest,
it has dark colors, so you can enjoy your movies at night without your eyes get affected by the lights.
Note: This Style works for all the new EgyBest addresses (the new Domain names)
( egy.best - egybest.com - egybest.org - egybest.club - egybest.online - egybest.site - egybest.biz - egybest.xyz - egybest.pw )
additional_info: ألوان داكنة مريحة للعينين للإستمتاع بمشاهدة الأفلام في الليل

discussions.name: Use Regex for the full support to all EgyBest domains!
